extendedInfo.description: The creators of your favorite Live Wallpapers are delighted to bring you another 3D Live wallpaper especially for Christmas.  Celebrate the Holidays every time you use your device, in true 3-D!Gather the family together in a cozy den, in front of a warm crackling fireplace.  Your own picture on the mantel is surrounded by twinkling Christmas lights, and stockings with your names grace the fireplace.  Enjoy a Christmas tree with customizable lights, gifts, and tree topper.  Eagerly await Santa's visit with a calendar that counts down the days until Christmas, and leave cookies and a note for Santa Claus.  Gaze out the frost-covered window at a picturesque Winter scene while snow gently falls.Customize every part of the scene, including your own photograph on the fireplace, your text on the stockings and the message for Santa.  Choose the color of lights, customize the ornaments, gifts and ribbons, snowflakes, garland, tree topper, and more!  You can also show or hide the items in the scene to celebrate the wonders of Christmas in a way that means the most to you.This wallpaper is true 3-D with hand-crafted artwork. Our wallpapers feature silky-smooth animations while conserving your battery life.Works great with phones, tablets, or any device that supports live wallpapers.

reviews.title: Gorgeous!
reviews.comment: Such a beautiful app, love that you can customised almost everything you see! Well worth the money :-)
reviews.author: Sam Snow

reviews.title: Very classy
reviews.comment: Great LWP! Just perfect for Christmas Eve! Very tasteful and Inlove having the option of adding the photo.
reviews.author: Shawn Samuels

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Ever since updating my SGS3 to Jelly Bean the app stop working completely, I open the app, hit continue and nothing happen, if not fixed I want my money back since I had it only for 2 weeks.  Update  Back to 5 stars again, I had to uninstall it and install it again 3 times to make it work, working beautifully again.
reviews.author: Ed Nunez

reviews.title: Best Christmas Wallpaper Ever!!
reviews.comment: I own all of Dualboot\'s live wallpapers because they are unique and gorgeous. Everyone I meet is in awe of this. You will be so happy you bought this. Hands down!!
reviews.author: Lashontray Smith

reviews.title: Best Christmas background ever!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: I have this installed on my rooted Nook Color running CM7,and it runs flawlessly and doesn\'t kill the battery as some background apps do. I love the level of personalization that is allowed in this app. If you want an excellent Christmas app then this is a must have!!!
reviews.author: Steven Reed

reviews.title: The best Christmas live wallpaper by far.
reviews.comment: It looks gorgeous on my Nexus 10. I was able to hang a named stocking for each of my family members. And the ability to customize the message to Santa and the status of the cookies was much appreciated.
reviews.author: Brian James

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: When on the train I often catch people trying to have as sneaky glance at my background, so I guess anyway! Really shows off some of the best aspects of android plus it helps me get in the seasonal mood.
reviews.author: Francis Hughes

reviews.title: A must buy
reviews.comment: I brought this last year and it\'s my most favorite Christmas wallpaper! U can change everything and anything worth every penny!
reviews.author: Katie Christopher

reviews.title: Fourth Stocking?
reviews.comment: Where is it? I put a name in settings not showing up on wallpaper. Excellent wallpaper, bought it last year and now enjoying some of the updated options
reviews.author: Bryan Mitchell

reviews.title: Outstanding---until most recent upgrade
reviews.comment: Galaxy S3:  Has worked great for 2 years but now I can\'t select/edit other themes, get the coffee to steam, write own Santa note, or even see the plate of any cookies. Haven\'t checked for other deficiencies as it\'s not worth it after today.  Please fix.  Merry Christmas!
reviews.author: AP H

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The detail of the graphics in this wallpaper is exceptional, toggles too numerous to count. So much fun. Thank you!
reviews.author: Yvonne Gentile

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Perfect in every way. A must have for the holidays.
reviews.author: David Itchue

reviews.title: Great app...
reviews.comment: My favorite Christmas wallpaper app. Some settings aren\'t working with Samsung Galaxy Note II...that\'s why I took off one star.
reviews.author: Dana Storms

reviews.title: Second Christmas and still love it!
reviews.comment: I bought this app last year and thought it was beautiful.  Reinstalled it earlier this month and wasn\'t disappointed!  It is by far my favorite screen saver app; I love the ability to write the note, set a personal photo above the fireplace and put names on the stockings.  Thanks for the creativity...I highly recommend it.
reviews.author: Nancy Reeder

reviews.title: Amazing app!
reviews.comment: The graphics are awesome and i love the personalization touch, not to mention, i got it fir only $0.25!! Best HD wallpaper I\'ve ever purchased.
reviews.author: Melinda Eleazer

reviews.title: I love your app!
reviews.comment: Your app puts a smile on my face every time I start my tablet. Thank you. Please make more live wallpapers!
reviews.author: Wildo Ballenilla

reviews.title: Smooth Running
reviews.comment: Lots of options, and I\'ve never had a problem running it on my Galaxy Tab..
reviews.author: Ty Taylor Taylor

reviews.title: Didn\'t I Rate This?
reviews.comment: The wallpaper that began my love for Dualboot? The one I kept on my phone WAY PAST CHRISTMAS! Here it is almost Valentines Day and I can put that one on. But the Christmas is the \"Mother of them all.\" The really BIG DIAMOND! Do you think I love this? Before Christmas was over I had bought all eleven wallpapers. This one is a would-be decorator\'s delight. Ena
reviews.author: Ena Randall

reviews.title: i love it!
reviews.comment: The Christmas day surprises were AWESOME. I want to keep this as my wallpaper all year round. I look forward to setting it each year...especially since it has so many new and cool updates. Absolutely LOVE it!
reviews.author: Luana Benson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'m a tried and true give it to me free. I bought this app based on reviews and don\'t regret one bit. In fact more than 10 of by friends bought it. Only reason not 5 star is does use up battery a bit faster than,I like.
reviews.author: Kari Koran
